relnotes.name: WAP Push Handlers
relnotes.purpose: Plugins and handlers including SISL (Several Interfaces, Single Logic) supporting WAP Push, uses WAP message API

preq.title: Alignment of CBR and System Model components

relnotes.preq: The contents of wapengine/inc and wapservers/inc are moved to wapplugins/inc.Also the content of WapPushSupport/group is moved to wapplugins/group.
Phase-I of Preq-1182 GNU Make-based build system, Filename Policy check updations
relnotes.defect: Obsolete header file paths and mmp file paths are removed from /wapplugins/group/bld.inf
